mapper.select: with t as ( select a.wishnum,a.cate_number,a.service_number,a.user_id, a.imgsavename,b.tour_name from ( select wishlist.wishnum, wishlist.cate_number, wishlist.service_number,wishlist.user_id, image.imgsavename from wishlist join image on wishlist.cate_number = image.cate_number and general_number=service_number where user_id=#{user_id} )a join ( select tour_name, service_number, cate_number from tour_service )b on a.cate_number = b.cate_number and a.service_number=b.service_number ) select wishnum,cate_number,service_number,user_id,min(imgsavename) imgsavename,tour_name from t group by wishnum,cate_number,service_number,user_id,tour_name order by wishnum
mapper.delete: delete wishlist where cate_number=#{cate_number} and service_number=#{service_number} and user_id=#{user_id}
